title: Nigel Farage’s Brexit Party wreaked havoc in Strasbourg – and left the EU fuming
text:
They’re smart, the Brexit Party. To the untrained eye, their behaviour in the European Parliament on Wednesday might have looked boorish and mindless. Personally, though, I’m convinced it was all part of a cunning plan.

Namely: to make the EU so heartily sick of us that they reject any request to delay Brexit, and just kick us out, instead.

It might well work, too. Plenty in the EU seem to have already lost patience with Brexit – strikingly few MEPs turned up for Wednesday's four-hour debate on it in Strasbourg. And of those who did turn up, many sounded deeply long-suffering.

“We have once more gathered to discuss the United Kingdom’s withdrawal from the European Union,” sighed Finland’s Tytti...
